summary: The Flood Resiliency and Land Stewardship Act (H.R. 4134) aims to amend the Food Security Act of 1985. It focuses on adding flood prevention, mitigation, and resiliency measures to the Regional Conservation Partnership Program (RCPP). The bill seeks to address natural resource concerns on a regional or watershed scale, including soil conservation, water protection, and the conservation of wildlife and agricultural land. It is sponsored by Mrs. Hinson and Mr. Sorensen and was referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
